mapper.select: SELECT c.dashboard_id, c.user_id, u.username AS username, c.title, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM contact_info_board c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.dashboard_id, c.user_id, u.username AS username, c.title, c.content, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM contact_info_board c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.dashboard_id = #{dashboard_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_info_board (user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
